Name: VR Mongolian Eagle
About the game: In this game you can experience the Mongolian Art of Archery in the VR world. Since times immemorial, Mongolian people have used archery as a sport, for hunting, and in wars. Here you will try the typical Mongol Archery, which is a type of archery practiced by the nomadic horsemen of the Mongolian steppe. • Drawing the bow with both arms and releasing an arrow with each arm • Shooting while riding a horse
